abstract: An interesting tidbit from the Apple earnings call: Of the 1.4 million iPhones sold so far, perhaps 250,000 of them were sold to people who wanted to unlock them from the AT&T network.
snippet: An interesting tidbit from the Apple earnings call: Of the 1.4 million iPhones sold so far, perhaps 250,000 of them were sold to people who wanted to unlock them from the AT&T network.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s earnings calls are notoriously devoid of information, but Apple’s chief operating officer, Timothy Cook, did drop one interesting figure.

headline.main: Apple: $100 Million Spent on Potential iBricks
